website_summaries.verdict: Creates a nice mix of taste, texture, and high-protein levels in a reasonably priced meal bar.
pros: Lower cost per bar than average
Nice chocolate taste with marshmallows for texture
Also works well for between meals or late-night snacks with 19 vitamins and minerals and no artificial sweeteners
cons: Only 240 calories in high protein bar, so one may not satisfy your hunger, and limited variety of tastes

website_summaries.verdict: Three types with varying taste and texture to please a variety of consumers. Blend of health benefits, quality taste, and price make it hard to match.
pros: Good choice for chocolate or marshmallow lovers, or for those who want either 14 grams of protein or the 19 vitamins and minerals
The perfect choice if you want all of these benefits at a reasonable price
cons: Some consumers who prefer fruity tastes are frustrated by the limited taste and texture options
Limited ability to fill the hungriest of consumers given at most around 240 calories a bar

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE THYROID ISSUES...THIS PRODUCT WILL INTERFERE WITH THE ENDOCRINE SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: I heard that these bars were the best on the market and created by a doctor. NOT SO THIS PRODUCT IS A THYROID and ENDOCRINE DISRUPTOR. The product tastes ok and does melt. I SHOULD HAVE READ THE LABEL BEFORE PURCHASING, BUT IMMEDIATELY HAD A REACTION WITH MY THYROID.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Frederick

customer_reviews.title: A better candy bar but heat sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: The 30 pack is actually 6 boxes of 5 bars each. I get them on subscribe & save because I eat one every morning. It's like starting off your day with a "not quite as bad for you" candy bar. But beware, they don't handle summer transit very well (see pic). The coating has melted, solidified, and flakes off when you open so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Luckey Duckey

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Shipping expired products
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Amazon shipping expired product. Rec'd order 12-28-19 with expiration date 10-30-19! Last order was stale! Love these bars but not Amazon's quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting when fresh...
customer_reviews.text: I have these bars set up for automatic delivery every month. Obviously I like them a lot! My only issue is that every ninth or 10th bar is stale. What I mean is, it’s not soft like the others, but instead hard And somewhat chewy. I’m not sure why this is, but I have definitely eaten enough of these bars to know when something isn’t right.
customer_reviews.author: My $.03

customer_reviews.title: All the flavor of cookie dough without the calories and salmonella!
customer_reviews.text: I love Love LOVE these! One bar weighs in at just 180 calories. They taste just like cookie dough, but you can eat them with less fear of judgment and salmonella. Bonus points for consistently helping me reach my protein goal! I used to buy these at the grocery store, but they're much cheaper on Amazon. My first online order was in the summer, and the bars were actually delivered in a temperature-regulated box.
customer_reviews.author: Pet LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mint Chocolate - Another Zone Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Zone Perfect makes the best nutrition bars, I've been a fan for 5 years or so & tried other brands that were horrid. Most Zone flavors I've tried don't have that cardboard texture/taste, they taste great. I saw the mint 1's & got them hoping my daughter would too, and she does. I can't say anything negative except the box is empty, I hope Zone has 10 bar boxes too. Prime prices are great in comparison to other carriers and stores.
customer_reviews.author: Hecate

customer_reviews.title: Zone bars are old, previously melted and stale
customer_reviews.text: The zone bars were obviously sitting in extreme heat and melted. When I opened a bar, lots of chocolate crumbs fell out and some stuck to the foil. The bar looked like it was peeling. When I tasted the bar, it was stale and the almonds tasted old. The last time I ordered them, it was a similar situation with the bars being previously melted but I hoped with each box I opened the bars would improve. Sadly, they did not. So this is not a one off. This is now the quality to expect from zone bars. Very disappointing. I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pullano

customer_reviews.title: Product is the best, buying it from Amazon is the problem
customer_reviews.text: Zone bar fudge Graham is my absolute favorite but the only store by where I live is often out of them so I tried buying them here, they had been previously melted and had lost their freshness because of it not to mention when you open one a bunch of the previously melted now hardened again chocolate coating falls into your lap. I rarely have this issue buying them from the store. Will not use Amazon for this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: What's happened to quality of Zone bars
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating a Double Dark Chocolate Zone bar every afternoon with a cup of tea for several years. The quality has steadily decreased over the past 6 months. Sadly, the attached picture is typical of the product I received in my 30 count order. Is this a manufacturer's quality control failure? Or a storage and shipping failure? The bars are discolored and have an unappetizing look. Very disappointing given that Zone bars are 1 of the few snack products that are healthy and actually "worth the calories".
customer_reviews.author: Ceek

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, lots of protein (without nuts), and with a great texture
customer_reviews.text: I generally hate protein bars - they generally have the texture of something used for construction work, not for eating. However, these are pleasant to chew and have a great real chocolate taste. They manage to provide the 23g of protein per bar without nuts. While not allergic, I just don't like the taste or texture of nuts, and they are present in almost every protein bar. So I was very glad to find these. I have one of these (or the Fudge Graham flavor) for breakfast every morning. They are inexpensive, get my brain started, make me feel full, are under 200 calories, and are enjoyable to eat. They also make for a healthy dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and practical
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I don't always have time to cook a full meal and need some extra calories throughout the day. Rather than going for another bar that only supplies sugar and carbs, I think this is, by far, the better option. The flavor is great, too, and satisfying to eat. Another reviewer was terribly shocked to find whole almonds in this bar - yeah, you gotta read the packaging. To me, those are a plus, and round out the texture of the bar nicely; a little chew, a little crunch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. But cant eat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from BJs originally but didnt want to purchase the other flavors sold in the value pack. I have Crohns disease so I need to be careful as to what I eat. While I did not have a problem with the BJs bought ones, I did get inflammation from these. I do not know why. I even took a month break and re tried them to make sure it was from these bars and it still happened. I do like them though and wish I could eat them...they make a great snack food. Not the highest in protien
customer_reviews.author: Aprylle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but not really a health bar..
customer_reviews.text: I eat these almost every morning. I started buying them for the amount of vitamins and minerals in them as it makes it a really easy and tasty way of getting them into my diet. But don't be fooled, these are basically like an enriched candy bar. High sugar content and ingredients aren't considered healthy. So just keep that in mind when deciding to buy these. Also, if you have a problem with self-control, be warned, these truly are quite tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Shianne

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tasting bars, I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are GOOD. They pack 15g of protein and have a great taste that puts protein bars to shame. The downside of these is the high saturated fat and sugar. Someone on keto wouldn't be able to eat this and someone with high cholesterol would be alarmed. As a person who averages 3000+ calories I can and will gladly eat these. I would recommend it to any bodybuilder, powerlifter, or athlete who wants a good tasting snack. Wish the pricing was more consistent. It ranges from 20-30 dollars and I would be more than happy to subscribe to them monthly if it sat at or close to $20.
customer_reviews.author: Simon H.

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have much time for lunch and we’re encouraged to bring things that don’t need to be refrigerated. I bring one of these and something else (pretzels or trail mix) and it provides just enough to get me through the second half of my shift. They’re no longer sold at Target where I used to get them but was glad to find them online at Amazon. Oh yes and for a protein bar, it actually tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Avila

customer_reviews.title: This is the best snack bar ever made.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most perfect snack bar on the planet. It has almonds and chocolate and more. It is chewy and crunchy with superb flavor. The only downside to this item is that I can no longer find it in stores. I now can only get it on Amazon but I'm grateful for that. This is a great bar to have on hand when you get the munchies and want something that meets all your cravings. This Zone bar far exceeds the other choices.
customer_reviews.author: Tikey

customer_reviews.title: All my boys  love them
customer_reviews.text: I can’t keep these on the shelves at my house!! My husband coaches football, baseball and basketball and we have tons of kids around all the time—so I keep these around. Lots of protein and taste great!! They love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M.

customer_reviews.title: These are soooo yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are family approved bars :) They are the best tasting protein bars I have found that everyone likes. Kids said only ones they like & only ones I should buy ;) I know sugar is higher in these vs Quest or others but these DO NOT taste like a protein bar at all. If you like cookie dough, you cannot go wrong trying these. We buy in bulk as we have so many in family, makes better price. Great yummy product, we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Heart

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, Yum, Gimme Some!
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars. They are by far my favorite, and I have tried more than I can count. The flavor is really good, there is no artificial sweetener taste. The texture is my favorite feature. They are soft and creamy with lots of chocolate chips. Although they are my favorite to eat, they are not extremely protein loaded (10 grams per bar). They are also a bit expensive. Although they are a bit protein stingy and costly, the flavor and texture outweigh these negatives. These bars satisfy my sweet tooth without doing the damage of eating a regular candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: a to z family foot care

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not buying again
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a protein bar to eat in the morning. I decided to try this one. It's hard? / tough to even chew. The taste isn't that great, but it does have 14g of protein so i will finish my box and never buy it again. Honestly if anyone is looking for a good protein bar try "Detour M&M's" had it at the store, and i'll be buying that for now on. Tasty, and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Braczynski

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure these are better not melted!
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting bars. I buy double chocolate, chocolate almond and chocolate peanut butter. Unfortunately on my first try of this flavor, Amazon delivered 30 chocolate bars at 5:30 PM and 95°F outside. Now in semi-liquid form. Not double-boxed either like they usually are so even more direct exposure to the heat.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I received two boxes two months in a row that the bars were so hard they could not be bitten in to. I am actually wondering if it is a fake product. I went to my local market, purchased a box and they were the delicious bars my husband and I have eaten every morning for ten years. I have cancelled my monthly order, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor is the salted caramel Zone perfect. I've tried a lot of protein bars. These are a tad on the sweet side but just satisfying enough that I generally am good with just eating one. Sometimes one is even too much for a treat. So far there is no other protein bar, for this price, I will eat. I used to love the ideal protein bars but hated the horrible price.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. H

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar for not a lot of protein
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to say I love these... the taste is awesome... but I want a protein bar to be healthy, or at least packed with protein and low in sugar. These have 18 grams of sugar for 10 grams of protein! A snickers bar only has two more grams of sugar. I love this brand of products but for that amount of sugar I’ll stick with a real treat. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The best bars out there, IMHO
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected and on-time. Thank you! I love these bars! They are my dark chocolate go-to food on the run, when I'm traveling, or for an easy breakfast with some coffee and fruit. It's nice that there are actual, large pieces of almonds, too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these at Walmart, five bars for four bucks. I haven't been able to find this flavor there for over a year. I've tried other flavors, but I don't like them nearly as well. This price isn't too bad. This week they have a five dollar coupon, but I don't need any more right now. Just my luck.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lee, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Zone Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 shipments of fudge graham. The first 2 shipments were exactly what I ordered... The entire 3rd shipment was a huge disappointment. I felt that I had received inferior bars...The chocolate layer was shredded in the wrapper. I could not eat these bars unless I had a dish to collect all the chocolate. As soon as you opened the bar pieces of chocolate went all over the place. I cancelled my order immediately. It was although i had discounted bars.... The zone protein bars have been part of my diet for over 4 years. Very disappointed. I will now look for another protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Diane N.  Boston

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! My son would eat them non stop if I let him. He is 8 and very picky. I tell him he can only have 1 a day. He eats it for breakfast. And I find he has packed them in his lunchbox too. I had to start hiding the boxes because I was finding the wrappers everywhere in the house! They are a candy bar to me. So yummy. I could actually eat them all day too :)
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate almond zone bars were shoved into my hot mailbox, melting all day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the chocolate almond Zone bars. I have been eating them for breakfast for over three years!! Don't care for any other flavor, but love these. Very disappointed when the delivery person shoved them into my mailbox on a HOT day! I spent five minutes trying to get them out of the mailbox! Now every time I open a bar, it flakes the cooled, melted chocolate all over everything!! Next time it needs to be put on my porch, like all deliveries I receive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! Such a wonderful taste!! Definitely does not have that protein bar texture. For 200 calories you get the texture of brownie and the taste of chocolate, caramel and saltiness! I've tried other brands like the ThinkThin Salted Caramel as well as ThinkThin Brownie Chunk as well and this definitely is WAY better than both. A million times better than the brownie one!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Anne

customer_reviews.title: Variable quality...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product many times and usually everything is fine (as are most Amazon.com products). There have however been a few shipments that were in kind of poor shape when they arrived. The last purchase arrived in a damaged bow and the bars were old tasting. There is a date on the bow which may be an expiration date (9/30/14) and the last package was torn open and was poor tasting. The price has gone up recently and I considered returning them, but I personally would not want returned food so others may feel the same way. When these bars are good they are VERY good, (my favorite in fact). But when they are less than good, well...
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: The best! I'm addicted. I love chocolate and do not need to eat cookies, candy or desserts. I now eat one of these in the morning and another after dinner and I get my sweet fix without the guilt or weight gain. I love them. I'm also a vegetarian and need protein substitutions, so this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sticky Blob
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Diet Zone Bars I've tried and have been eating them for over a year. I love Cookie Dough in general, but these were awful. Texture wise they are like a blob of sticky candy...very unlike any of the Zone Bars I had tried previously. Stick with Fudge Graham, Double Dark Chocolate, and Cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: seektruth

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! I have one for breakfast every morning with my coffee. This last case seemed to to have possibly been subjected to fairly warm temperatures. The chocolate had melted a little on the inside of the wrapper. Didn't affect the taste or texture at all, though.
customer_reviews.author: Tura Lura

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Zone bars, mostly because I'm so tired of every other kind! Most snack/protein bars are dry, and this is so soft and I forget I'm eating a protein bar... more like cookie dough candy bar. Only thing that I feel weary of is the sugar content. They are pretty sweet, but that's probably why they taste so good.
customer_reviews.author: Raykim98

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but price went up
customer_reviews.text: These are super good and had been buying the 30 pack boxes for about $25. Now, they've gone up to $38! Not sure what's going on, but hope they go down soon.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Igleasias

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've found these flavored bars at my grocery store on an off and they are my favorite flavor. Recently they have not had them in stock, so I was delighted to find them on Amazon. The price was better than I ever got them at the grocery store even when they were on sale for about one dollar a bar. This is an excellent deal, and I really like these bars because they're not high on calories but very tasty and good after workout snack.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality protein bar!
customer_reviews.text: I love the balance of protein, sugar, fat and calories in these bars. Sometimes they are on sale for less at the grocery store, but I love the convenience of not having to shop for them.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Good but not always fresh
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 boxes of these because they do taste really good. But when they came, they tasted stale. I don't know if it is a problem from the production, or the storage, or the transmit but they taste bad. I know what they are supposed to taste like but this batch was hard and I felt like o waa gonna break a tooth eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C

customer_reviews.title: Please not buying this! These bars were not fresh!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nutrition Snack Bars in March, but the Expiration Date is 5/1 ???? (only 2 months? I thought this kind of Nutrition bar suppose has longer shelf life..)Definitely not buying this again!!!!!! These bars were not fresh at all.
customer_reviews.author: yung hao

customer_reviews.title: Tastes stale
customer_reviews.text: The peanut butter chocolate chip bars I received are much denser/harder than some I bought at the grocery store, which makes them less pleasant to eat. They don't expire until Nov 2020, so I'm not sure why they would seem stale like that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Contains too much sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bars until I saw how much sugar they contain.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mulroy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but melts in transit
customer_reviews.text: We love these bars and were pumped to find them on Amazon but this time when they came they had all melted so when you open one up crumbles of chocolate fall out all over the place. I get that it’s hard to control that so I may need to stick to picking these up at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Product great, delivery an issue!
customer_reviews.text: Love my ZonePerfect Bars but once again I received my 5 boxes and the bars melt during delivery. This makes them impossible to eat due to the mess and actually changes the taste. I must return these bars and cancel my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 eaten bar is box!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but when I opened a sealed box 1 of the bars looks like it was 1/2 eaten. I tripled checked the seal and the box was completely sealed. I’m terrified to eat the other 5 bars in the box. What do I do with this box?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bar too much sugar though
customer_reviews.text: Just as I wanted in perfect condition, price was fair, came on time, taste great, little too much sugar is my only complaint on this bar I can’t eat the whole thing at once but besides that it’s great tasting and I have to get a lot of protein in other ways this deff helps
customer_reviews.author: Asuna Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Goodness
customer_reviews.text: I like that these have great vitamin content. I actually felt better after eating these for a few days. I guess I was missing one of the vitamins that are in these bars. Now I eat them regularly. At the time of this writing I have found a better price in a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael J. Beninate

customer_reviews.title: Great portable breakfast or snack!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these for breakfast-on-the-go, as well as for quick afternoon pick-me-ups. Since Sam's Club stopped carrying them, we've been waiting for them to go on sale at the grocery store. At less than $1 per bar, this is the best price around, and with subscribe-and-save we get them on a regular basis...so I don't have to wait for sales or go to the store!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reigrut

customer_reviews.title: Protien
customer_reviews.text: These ZonePerfect bars are the only ones that have 15g of protein. The rest of the line are 14g or less protein. They taste great, but aren't priced right when you look at price per g of protein
customer_reviews.author: steve l

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: These bars are very good with a cup of coffee! They have a lot of protein in them, so they keep me from being hungry until lunch time. Some of the others of this brand are grainy or too sweet, but I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are really delicious, and help curb my hanger pains. I usually don't have time to eat breakfast or lunch, and I use protein bars as a meal replacement. I am glad I found this brand, because I also don't eat nuts, and every other protein bar has nuts in it. These taste almost dessert like Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute FAVORITE protein bars. They don't have that weird protein flavor like all the other bars and I've had many. They taste exactly like cookie dough. Can't get better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Desi Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been eating these bars for years. If they had a 100 box pack, I would buy it. This is the best value. I buy 2 boxes every month. I think my kids are addicted to them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookie Dough
customer_reviews.text: These are are in my top three for favorite protein bars! Surprisingly low calorie for taste and protein value. I get them at the store but much easier to buy them in bulk here!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I guess at first you trick yourself into liking them because they are cheap, but then you realize just how bad they are. No good taste, no good texture, no nothing. They are awful.
customer_reviews.author: Zehcnas

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack on the Gooo!
customer_reviews.text: These Chocolate Almond Raisin, ZonePerfect Nutrition Snack Bars are a healthy snack for those people always on the go. They taste great and they are also a GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal for this many zone bars! The peanut butter flavor is great. Loaded with protein and can be eaten as a meal or snack. My husband’s favorite protein bar!
customer_reviews.author: AmazingGrace

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We go through A LOT of these in our house, so I thought this would be easier way to keep from running out of them. Unfortunately they weren't very fresh and my kids could tell the difference :( Maybe shipping was not refrigerated?
customer_reviews.author: Annette Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great taste when not melted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when I need/want my chocolate fix. I want to believe they are healthier then chocolate (lol). However, they came melted :( with the chocolate covering the inside wrapper. Maybe package these in some form of insulation when delivering to South FL in the hot summer months. I know that's a delivery issue and not a product issue but I don't know where to report that.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Kalkstein

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor, Curbs Hunger
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor and the fact that it has 15g of protein. It could use just a little more cinnamon to taste more like a cinnamon roll. Cinnamon is also good for curbing your appetite, so a little more would help to keep hunger away longer. I grab this in the morning on the way to work when there is no time for breakfast or as a snack during the day. The price on Amazon was the best that I found.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ruth Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Stale food
customer_reviews.text: When I ate the first bar it was stale. And I’m very disappointed. I tried my first bar at Walgreens and was looking to buy in bulk. Little did I know I was buying stale bulk. These bars actually have really bad ingredients like high fructose corn syrup and it no better than a candy bar. Don’t be fooled. I was at first but now I’m doing my research on healthy foods that I should be eating.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Altamira

customer_reviews.title: Taste is weird
customer_reviews.text: These were a good texture but the taste was gross. I did not like this flavor at all. Would not recommend this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Shipping out of date food.
customer_reviews.text: These energy bars taste much better than most. They can be a quick snack that is fairly nutritious. However the last 2 boxes I ordered have been months out of date. I didn't notice at first because I expected they would be fresh. But they aren't. I will probably go back to getting them at Target. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: WA girl in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Zone Bars For Your Daily Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This particular product has been my breakfast (along with a steaming cup of coffee) for about 15 years. It is full of vital nutrients and very satisfying. I prefer the Zone Chocolate Peanut Butter bar over any other bar I have tasted.
customer_reviews.author: integrity

customer_reviews.title: Zone Bars are not of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of the chocolate peanut butter Zone bars and have ordered them previously thru Amazon. This order is different in that each bar appeared to have had the chocolate melted inside the wrapper and when one opens it up the chocolate falls out on on your clothes, table, floor, etc. the chocolate is gooey inside and the bars taste old and chewier than normal. Unfortunately I bought several boxes and all have had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: stephen c.

customer_reviews.title: Good but weirdly Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these bars for years now, I think they're a good value and strike a reasonable balance between taste and not being too terrible for you (the sugar is pretty high admittedly). Most of the time they're delicious, but every once in a while you'll get some that taste kind of funny and might even be hard to bite into. I'm not sure what causes this but it's definitely something to look out for.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty! Easy to eat. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! As described. A+++ transaction. very fast ship; sooner than expected. Excellent price and easy to eat. No hard nuts to try and chew. Love them and plan to buy again. Noticed the dates on the boxes have passed. Not sure if those are the made date or expiration date,
customer_reviews.author: MARY E LEPAGE

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great tasting protein bar.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I rarely find them In stores which makes no sense. I think it's the best tasting bar Zone Perfect makes. 10 grams of protein and glutton free and mouthwatering, chewy, gooey oatmeal & chocolate chips. Real ingredients and only 180 calories - what's not to like? I took away one star for appearance. They are small and naked. Not exactly what's pictured n the box. But oh so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars
customer_reviews.text: High in protein, great flavor (my favorite and the only one I'll buy) and hard to find anywhere else. Had no idea Zone Perfect offered so many flavors so might get brave and try a few others.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Pina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE FLAVOR!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor and it's not easily found in any of our local stores. Also, the pricing/unit was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: this is not in regards to the product
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product, I would give it five stars. I love these bars. However, this entire shipment must have been melted at some point. Wherever these were being stored or possibly the shipping itself, made a huge mess. The chocolate coating is awful. It is bad enough that it can make me leery to eat it. I ordered a peanut butter supply of the bars at the same time. They are great. It makes me think they were from different places. Regardless, the storage and shipping should be reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Price nearly doubled!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, eat them daily but recently price went up. Likely will find an alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: A tasty little breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: I ate these bars mainly as a breakfast supplement, and I found the entire package to be tasty and fresh. They were a bit harder in texture than what I was expecting, but the flavor made up for that. The product also arrived in a timely manner and in good condition. I won't hesitate to order these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ichirou

customer_reviews.title: Me and my fiancé love these
customer_reviews.text: Man, these things are addicting !!! The best snack, and the best thing about to eat on the run !! I highly recommend these to anyone but I’m warning you , you will be addicted quickly! Between the wife and I , we buy a whole case every 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: BIGDOGBRANDO

customer_reviews.title: Always have on hand
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I hate the taste of most protein bars. This is my favorite one and the best part is that I can order 30 every two months and it keeps me supplied!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars, but Do not Buy Here- Stale!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these bars elsewhere and love them. However, I thought I'd buy them here in bulk to save some money, but they are not worth it. They arrived partially melted and taste old and stale. Great bars, but buy them elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I have gestational diabetes and these make the perfect on the go snack with lower carbs and a great amount of protein. These have really helped me manage my blood sugar levels, and I feel like I’m having a treat!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent snack bars with decent protein!
customer_reviews.text: These Zone bars taste great and have a good texture and decent amount of protein. And found them here at a better price than in store! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HappyVegas

customer_reviews.title: Protein good/sugar bad
customer_reviews.text: Too damned much sugar! This prodict is alright but would be MUCH better if sugar content were cut by half or more.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Fahrendorff

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great keto snack or meal replacement with great macros. My wife loved them but a tad too sweet for me but i will eat them over Atkin snacks. Definitely a go to product
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein bars, hands down. These are delicious and filling, an easy meal on the go.
customer_reviews.author: UnbridledJoy714

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and soft texture. These taste like a treat. Perfect for a quick snack and quick boost of protein and fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong advertizing
customer_reviews.text: The advt. says, 30 counts. But when I received it, it was only 20 count, 4 boxes of 5 each. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Edi Shivaji

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The only place I can find these is Target and may times they are out. The price here is more than Target, but I am not complaining. I have been eating these since 2008. I am SO addicted. I like mint chocolate as my second runner up. Strawberry yogurt is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: penny robertson

customer_reviews.title: Power Bars
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty protein bars. Great for pick me up on golf course. Many flavors available & all good.
customer_reviews.author: James A Willson

customer_reviews.title: Small and not at all filling
customer_reviews.text: A small sugary bar. Not bad tasting but not what I expected. Not at all filling , would not qualify as an appetizer let alone a meal replacement. Candy bar a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: dmi

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily satisfies your hunger.  Tastes like a sweet, chocolaty rice cereal and Crunch candy bar.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favs to snack on as I can easily eat a couple of these a day. The chocolate melts nicely and I like the crunch combination with the graham taste. It's a great and healthy alternative to eating cereal on the go. Can be eaten any time of the day.
customer_reviews.author: N U

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I tried the chocolate peanut butter one a while ago when I purchased it at Publix. The caramel cluster taste just as good. It's a great way to start my day. I'll continue buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Shem

customer_reviews.title: These bars were melted and then refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: When I went to open these bars, the chocolate was all mottled(like when you freeze it improperly) and the bar had definitely been melted at one time and then cooled again. I took a picture, but couldn't figure out how to upload it.
customer_reviews.author: informed1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best nutrition bar I've had to date. They are Moist, chewy like a real brownie. I'm cutting back on sugar and this is a great alternative to cookies, cakes or brownies!
customer_reviews.author: Angie SKYHH

customer_reviews.title: Chewy N' Crunchy; Sweet N' Salty-Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Zone customer since the late 1990's and have always enjoyed their Zone Bars. This bar has 10g protein (other Zone bars have as much as 18g), and is a wonderful mix chewy and crunchy, and Sweet N' Salty. I like that the bars are a satisfying snack and are perfect for that in-between meal that leaves me ready for the next regular meals. I use about 30 bars a month. This new flavor is one of my Zone staples.
customer_reviews.author: cforakis

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best energy bar ever. They actually taste good and they travel well so taking them hiking. They love bike rides too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clark

customer_reviews.title: THEY WERE ALL MELTED.
customer_reviews.text: They came in packed with another item and I opened them and they were all melted. I threw away all of the boxes and the money I spent buying them. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So excited to see I could find these on Amazon and bonus that they are subscribe and save eligible! These are great on the go or for an in between meals pick you up! The flavor isn’t a strong chemical one like some other brands. Glad to find these!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Giles

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but pose a serious choking hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Although these are not weight loss bars, I always loose weight on these bars. These are very tasty and chewy so please be careful when you eat these. If not eaten in small bites, especially the Chewy Chocolate flavor, they pose a serious choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy chocolate! Such a problem. Kinda crispy cookie like texture.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Delicious/ High carbs though!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite ones! But they're more like a desert than a health food! A LOT of sugar in them so I can't eat them everyday. Just before work outs so that I burn the carbs off. But they're very yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Dentgal

customer_reviews.title: Too too sweet with almost not enough almond
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I opened and tasted the bar it was much too sweet to eat it all and very little almond in it . I bought the whole big box of 30 bars . I do not think I like to eat any more of these. I have always bought Almond and chocolate bars and those are good in taste. And not too sweet like this bar. I rather return this in exchange of chocolate and almond bar
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMED  IBRAHIM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stawberry/Vanilla CRUNCH!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly delicious. They have a good strawberry flavor with a little vanilla icing and a lot of crispy crunch. They’re addictive and not cheap so watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be in stores
customer_reviews.text: Why this is the only flavor not sold in stores is beyond me. Best one they ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Walker

product_meta.title: Zoneperfect Classic Protein Bars, Fudge Graham, High Protein, With Vitamins & Minerals 1.76 Ounce (30 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Fudge GrahamZonePerfect Nutrition Bars offer delicious taste you’ll love and quality nutrition to help you make the most of every day. Each bar has 10-15g of protein to help keep you feeling fuller longer, and up to 19 vitamins & minerals,* including antioxidants† for immune support. Our go-anywhere high protein snack bars are so good, if you’re not 100% satisfied with the taste, we’ll give you your money back, guaranteed! * Except our gluten-free Oatmeal Chocolate Chunk. † Vitamins C & E and selenium.
feature_bullets: MADE FOR TASTE: Our protein bars are packed with delicious flavor and nutrition you need to make the most of your day
POWER OF PROTEIN: ZonePerfect Nutrition Bars have 10-15g of protein to help you feel fuller longer
NUTRITION YOU NEED: A good source of up to 19 vitamins & minerals, including antioxidants for immune support
FOR YOUR LIFESTYLE: Our go-anywhere high protein snack bars are so good you’ll want to have one with you all the time. No Artificial Sweeteners
GREAT TASTE GUARANTEED: If you’re not 100% satisfied with a flavor, we’ll give you your money back—guaranteed!
Eligible to be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits
In select stores;The SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assurance Program) name is a service mark of the U.S. Department of Agriculture;USDA does not endorse any goods, services, or enterprises

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
